Tests object revelation in the UI.


Running: init

Running: revealNode
Node revealed in the Elements panel

Running: revealRemovedNode
Removed node not revealed

Running: revealNodeWithRemovedParent
Node with removed parent not revealed

Running: revealUILocation
UILocation bar.js:2:1 revealed in the Sources panel

Running: revealResource
Resource bar.js revealed in the Resources panel

Running: revealRequestWithResource
Request bar.js revealed in the Network panel

Running: revealRequestWithoutResource
